content: SPX-A Speed core bit Ultimate core bit for hand-held and rig-based core drilling in virtually all types of concrete and masonry – core bit for cordless core drills ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Our highest drilling speed – cordless optimized core bits drill up to 50% faster than regular core bits, helping to increase your productivity with cordless diamond core drills More coring per charge – optimized for cordless core drilling for up to 50% more battery reach Versatility – can be used for either handheld and rig-based core drilling in both concrete, and masonry Better handling – easier to start drilling and engineered for smoother and faster drilling through concrete with high rebar content Hilti Equidist technology (1 1/2 diameter and above) – precisely positioned diamonds for unmatched drilling performance and constant drilling speeds over the entire life of the core bit Applications Cordless core drilling Rig-based and hand-held wet coring in concrete Hand-held dry coring in masonry BI quick-release connection end for cordless Hilti diamond drilling tools and BS (1-¼) universal connection end for third party diamond drilling tools ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: DD 150-U-22 Base materials: Concrete, Masonry Drilling Mode: Hand-held and rig-mounted Technical Data | For use with | DD 150-U-22 | Base materials | Concrete, Masonry | Drilling Mode | Hand-held and rig-mounted | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry | Laser welded segments | Yes | Connection end | BI (Hilti), No connection end, BS (1-1/4 in), BT (5/8 in) | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 3956184 -
